Name: Pulse Bow
LongDescription: May restore the PP of one of the Pokémon's moves upon taking damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Plusle  You can get a Pulse Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Plusle Tail, a Plusle Card, and a Cheer Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
